Articles.Content: When i try to do a rendavous the space station keeps rotating even when i hav'nt bumped it. Any tips to help stop this?

Currently, all unpiloted (and some piloted) ships do this. It's not so much a bug as an aspect of the game that isn't finished. You can reduce it by setting your orbits higher, but you can't stop it. (Unless there's a mod for it, but I don't mess around with mods.)

To stop it, when you get within 'docking' distance, use a bracket ([ or]) to switch to the other ship. Stop the rotation, then switch back to the rendezvousing one. The rotation will start again shortly, but it'll give you a brief moment to catch it.
If you pop timewarp to 5x for half a second and then put it back down all rotation of the ship should stop.
